languageKey.label: session timeout
Session time out for backend users. Default is 3600 seconds = 1 hour.
devIPmask
Defines a list of IP addresses which will allow development-output to display.
The debug() function will use this as a filter. See the function t3lib_div::cmpIP() for details on syntax. Setting this to blank value will deny all. Setting to "*" will allow all.
